scripts.dp:stg:e: eval "$(assume-role) sls deploy -v -r us-east-1 -s stg --acct dev --force"
scripts.dp:stg:w: eval "$(assume-role) sls deploy -v -r us-west-2 -s stg --acct dev --force"
scripts.dp:prd:e: eval "$(assume-role) sls deploy -v -r us-east-1 -s prd --acct prod --force"
scripts.dp:prd:w: eval "$(assume-role) sls deploy -v -r us-west-2 -s prd --acct prod --force"
